#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MAX 1000000007
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
	ll i,n,t,a[100005],max,min;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		min=MAX; max=-MAX;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
			if( (a[i]-min)>max ) max=a[i]-min;
			if(a[i]<min) min=a[i];
		}
		printf("%lld\n",max);
	}
	return 0;
}
